participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is creative and enjoys working on projects that challenge her skills. She's passionate about her profession and likes to engage with others through her interests.
participant_1.background: i am an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. my parents were also teachers. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is adventurous and enjoys exploring different hobbies. His playful side comes out through his interest in roleplaying games and his casual conversation style.
participant_2.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games.
